strings.string: GER_Change your digital satellite receiver settings
GER_Setup your digital satellite receiver including antenna, channel search, update, etc
GER_Display the programme information of each channel in time and date order

GER_Manage and view your multimedia content in one place
GER_Display device information including system versions, free disk space, etc
